page.title: 18CAITHNESS DIALECT
page.content:
One day a went doon ey harbour a look to see a could see any'hing, but a couldny see any'hing so a went up to ee hoos an' watched ee tv. There was nothin' on so I went oot tae see if 'ere was ano'hing tae dow.
{TRANSLATION}
One day I went down the harbour to look and see if I could see anything to do, but I couldn't see anything so I went up to the house and watched the television. There was nothing on so I went out to see if there was anything to do.
Written by JASON HAMILTON, Lilybank, Keiss.
